title: Who would the rest of the world vote for in your country's election?
description: Wish you could vote in another country's election? Simon Anholt unveils the Global Vote, an online platform that lets anybody, anywhere in the world, "vote" in the election of any country on earth (with surprising results).
author: Simon Anholt
keywords: TED, talks, collaboration, communication, community, democracy, Foreign Policy, global issues, economics, future, government, history, innovation, policy, social change, politics, society, TEDx, world cultures
